chunks.text:
Training Hall: Bettwiesenhalle Unterensingen

Address: Bettwiesenhalle, Schulstraße 43, 72669 Unterensingen

Equipment: Professional volleyball courts with state-of-the-art technology. The hall is equipped with everything needed for quality training.

Facilities: Locker rooms, showers, training equipment.

Season: Indoor volleyball runs from October to April.

Indoor Training Schedule 2026

Monday: 20:00 - 22:00
Location: Bettwiesenhalle, Schulstraße 43, 72669 Unterensingen

Indoor volleyball runs from October to April. This is the main season for indoor training.

Beach Volleyball: Beach Courts Zizishausen

Address: Beach courts Zizishausen

Equipment: Professional beach facility with 3 courts. Training takes place on sand in the open air.

Season: Beach volleyball runs from April to September.

Beach volleyball develops agility, endurance, and tactical thinking on the sand.

Beach Volleyball Training Schedule 2026

Monday: 17:00 - 20:00
Location: Beach courts Zizishausen

Wednesday: 17:00 - 20:00
Location: Beach courts Zizishausen

Beach volleyball runs from April to September. Outdoor training on sand courts.

Contact Information SKV Unterensingen

Club: SKV Unterensingen Volleyball
Team: SG TSV Zizishausen/SKV Unterensingen

For questions about training, schedules, or joining the club, contact us through the contact form on the website.

Website: https://skvunterensingen.netlify.app

Directions to Bettwiesenhalle

Address: Schulstraße 43, 72669 Unterensingen

By car: The hall is located in the center of Unterensingen, parking is available nearby.

Public transport: Bus stop near the hall.

The hall is easy to find at Schulstraße 43.

Directions to Beach Courts Zizishausen

Location: Beach courts Zizishausen

The beach courts are located in Zizishausen. It is a professional facility with 3 courts for beach volleyball.

Training takes place outdoors from April to September.
